verses.name: Mark 16:16
verses.text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.

verses.name: Mark 16:17
verses.text: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;

verses.name: Mark 16:18
verses.text: They shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.

verses.name: Mark 16:19
verses.text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.
